application.doc: Federation unconfiguration for a reverse proxy instance

param.name: id
param.doc: Name of the instance to act on, which is a unique name that identifies the instance

param.name: federation_id
param.doc: ID of the federation to act on.

method.name: DELETE
method.id: Federation unconfiguration for a reverse proxy instance
method.doc: This RESTful web service is used to remove protocol specific configuration from an existing reverse proxy instance for a given federation provider. The junction is removed, and ACLs are deleted on the policy server.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
